lead_paragraph: An emotional and apologetic Sam Allardyce headed for the airport  on Wednesday, blaming entrapment for his shock exit as England manager but recognizing that an error of judgment had led to his downfall.

headline.print_headline: Soccer: 'Silly' Allardyce Says Error of Judgment Led to Shock Exit
headline.main: Soccer: 'Silly' Allardyce Says Error of Judgment Led to Shock Exit

snippet: An emotional and apologetic Sam Allardyce headed for the airport  on Wednesday, blaming entrapment for his shock exit as England manager but recognizing that an error of judgment had led to his downfall....
